meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Chris Fleitas Lindsy Lassere Sergio Llorian Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6214.

td.p: Chris Fleitas, a high school college prep counselor from San Francisco, California
Lindsy Lassere, a homemaker and fitness instructor originally from Lake Charles, Louisiana
Sergio Llorian, an attorney from New York, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $29,201)

tr.td: EAT-YMOLOGY
SIDEKICKS
ARCTIC WILDLIFE
UNDER THIS CABINET DEPARTMENT
"NOT" IN FRONT
OF THE CHILDREN

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The name of this foodstuff comes from the Chinese "dou" for beans & "fu" for rotten')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The name of this foodstuff comes from the Chinese "dou" for beans & "fu" for rotten
